prompt: Add an Azure SQL Database to the existing setup. Ensure it is placed in the same resource group and location as the AKS and Key Vault.
Create a static website hosted on Azure Blob Storage. Ensure it is accessible publicly and place it in the same resource group.
Integrate an Azure Log Analytics Workspace to monitor the AKS cluster.
Enable auto-scaling for the AKS cluster to automatically adjust the number of nodes based on CPU utilization.
Refactor the resource group creation into a separate submodule to promote reusability.
Add an Azure Virtual Network with three subnets: one for the AKS cluster, one for the Key Vault, and one for the SQL Database.
Integrate an Azure Application Gateway to manage traffic to the AKS cluster.
Deploy an Azure VPN Gateway for secure network traffic to the resources.
Configure Azure Key Vault to store and manage secrets for the AKS cluster, ensuring the AKS cluster can access these secrets securely.
